poem:
**Watts of Descent**

Prices tumble like loose leaves,   
swayed by new winds of power;   
yet the pocket remains absent.   
Figures spin tales, woven by   
currents unseen. Beneath the   
surface, whispers of change are lost.   
The light of hope flickers on the   
edge of dark horizons, guarded   
by the silent sentinels of greed.
